title: 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug N300 George Haddock- Casey Stengel Collection Sold, Thanks
author: edjs

posts.post_title: 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug N300 George Haddock- Casey Stengel Collection Sold, Thanks
posts.post_content:
Selling my 1895 Mayo's Cut Plug N300 George Haddock.  This card was part of a group of 1895 Mayo's that were once owned by the great Casey Stengel.  Looking for [strike]$350[/strike] sold on  this pedigreed card.  I accept PayPal friends and family or  regular.   Price is net to me, so please add 3% for regular PayPal.   Shipping and  insurance is on me for US addresses, I will work with you if you are in  another country.

It never hurts to make an offer, so feel free to PM or e-mail with   questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing negotiations.   Thanks for looking.
Still available, make an offer on this one of a kind card.  From the scrapbook of the old professor himself!
